Description: Vow Green Metals AS is a Norway-based producer of BioCarbon for the metallurgic industry and CO2-neutral energy for energy intensive industries. In Vow Green Metals factories, the Companyl recycles waste streams from wood and produce two main products; BioCarbon (labeled BioCarbon) and CO2-neutral energy. The purpose with BioCarbon is to replace the use of fossil carbon. The second product, CO2-neutral energy can be used to replace fossil gas in energy-intensive industries. The Company aims to provide solutions for the metallurgical industry and to meet the growing demand for industry decarbonising. Vow Green Metals AS builds, owes, and operates plants that produce high value biocarbon for the metallurgical industry.

Author: Bjørn Borkamo
Kahni Ismail
TDN Direkt
Martin Kværnes

Ingeborg Løkling
Title: Vow Green Metals med resultat før skatt på minus 6,8 millioner kroner
